embeds.title: Guila (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Guila
Fire-element DPS knight with a unique Demon Form transformation via her Ultimate. Lance and Rapier are high-damage offensive weapons; Sword & Shield converts her into a tanky counter-attacker with team barrier support.
